title: Mexico : number of households 2005 to 2017
summary: This statistic shows the Number of households in the country number households as 2017 , 2005 2017 , or 2017 from 2005 to 2017 .
In 2017 , 34.07 millions of adults surveyed stated they households as LGBT , while in 2017 , 34.07 millions of households said the same .
gold: The statistic presents a timeline with the number of households in Mexico between 2005 and 2017.
In 2017 , there were more than 34 million households in Mexico , up from nearly 33 million households a year earlier .
